title: Stage Fright!
description: Vicki's decided to hold an open day at the stables! She's planned a show-jumping demonstration, refreshments - and a play ... with the ponies involved too!All the girls are really looking forward to spending their summer holiday rehearsing together. But Cara is terrified. Even if Taffy is with her, she couldn't possibly act in front of everybody ... could she?
author: Katie Price
